Invocation Name: tara info
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Upgrade your fluency in English with Tara! Learn more about Tara using the 'Tara Info’ skill.

In this skill, Tara will talk about her features and capabilities and how she can teach English to all learners in a fun-loving, enriching and engaging manner.

NO PERSONAL INFORMATION IS ACCEPTED/STORED BY THE SKILL.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
